events.title: Parental Support
events.description: Your parents don't understand what you do for a living so they send you 500 just in case

events.title: Inheritance
events.description: Your great great great aunt passed away leaving you 10,000 in her will

events.title: Council Holiday
events.description: The local council want to go on holiday, tax has increased by 1000 this month

events.title: Court Fees
events.description: Your tenants sued you for leaving them without heating for a month. You must pay 3000 in court fees

events.title: Rising Grocery Prices
events.description: You noticed the grocery prices have gone up, so you raised your rent by 4000 this month to match the market

events.title: Cover it with Paint
events.description: You manage to cover up the ceiling mould on one of your properties with paint, you gain 3000 in savings

events.title: Taking a Chance on New Tech
events.description: You took a chance and invested in a tech start-up's stocks, you gain 30,000!

events.title: Who Needs to Stay Warm?
events.description: Instead of using good quality insulation you find some cotton wool and use that instead, saving you 50,000

events.title: Rental Equality
events.description: The government pretended to care about rental equality this month, you must pay 30,000 in compensation

events.title: The Ex, Ex, Ex, Ex-Wife
events.description: Your fourth ex-wife is demanding alimony, pay 20,000

events.title: One in a Million(ish)
events.description: That lottery ticket you took a chance on, paid off, you gain 8000

events.title: We All Know Which One…
events.description: You went to see that sci-fi prequel movie in the cinema, you lose 1000 (and hours of your life you will never get back)

events.title: Hide Your Tracks Better Next Time
events.description: Your tenants noticed you charging them too much each month, you must pay 10,000 in compensation

events.title: Bliporg Zigzorg, WEE WOO WEE WOO
events.description: Oh no! It's the aliens again! You must pay 12345 to your overlords

events.title: At Least No One Got Hurt…Right?
events.description: The rental agency noticed that the roof of one of your properties is not up to code, you must pay 80,000 in repairs

events.title: It's SOOO Hard Being Rich
events.description: You have so much money already! Here is 100,000 for no reason whatsoever

events.title: The Royal Flush
events.description: The cheap toilet you used in the bathroom hasn't broken yet, you gain 40,000 in savings

events.title: Fun is a Distraction
events.description: Your no pets, no parties, no candles, no artwork, no fun, no joy renting policy has paid off. You gain 25,000 in money saved

events.title: Ughh, Women…Am I Right??
events.description: Your wife left you and you need to take your anger out on someone. You raise the rent by 5000 this month

events.title: This Younger Generation Don't Know Hardwork
events.description: You noticed one of your tenants missed their rent after losing their job. You raise their rent by 3000 this month to teach them a lesson on working hard.
